Trinity Comprehensive Academy
Trinity's
tea party
Music is indispensable for a wonderful tea time. Gunners, help. (Nagisa Kirifuji)
God the Father, God the Son, God the Holy Spirit
[ICON_Faith] Faith +20% in cities with worship buildings of religions founded by your civilization.
Lord, have mercy
Cities gain an additional yield of [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to 15% of their [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Saya: "Perhaps the story that's about to begin might not be suitable for someone like you, it might be unsuitable for someone like you. It's unpleasant, unpleasant, abominable, frowning... Suspicious of the other party, premise. Doubting, doubting assumptions, and doubting the truth... sad, bitter, and depressing... but with a bitter aftertaste... That's the kind of story."

Trinity Square

A unique district of Trinity. Replace sacred grounds. [NEWLINE] Generates more [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points than regular Holy Sites. Additionally, the [ICON_District] District Adjacency bonus for [ICON_Faith] Faith increased to +1 instead of +0.5.
Old bookstore

A unique building of Trinity. Replace the library. [NEWLINE][ICON_Science] Science +2. Additional [ICON_Science] +1 science per age after construction or last repair. Don't get looted by natural disasters.
Mika ``Mika Seizono is finally here~â˜†, doesn't it feel like it?'' [NEWLINE] Nagisa ``Hello.
Tea Party invites you to your own city (if you accept, the location of the nearby partner city will be revealed)
You invited a tea party to your home city.
The Tea Party proposes a map exchange.
Nagisa: "Fufu. It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?"
Nagisa: On behalf of all the students of Trinity, I would like to thank you.
Nagisa: "Fufu. Good day."
Nagisa "If you miss delicious tea, please come to the Tea Party anytime. We look forward to seeing you." (The Tea Party wants to declare friendship with you.)
Nagisa: On behalf of all the students of Trinity, I would like to thank you.
Nagisa: "Fufu. Good afternoon." (Refused to declare friendship with the Tea Party.)
Nagisa: "Oh, it's already May! I'm going to throw in a roll cake!"
Nagisa: "Why do you do this, one after another...I'm going to throw macaroons into my mouth until my mouth rips open!"
Mika: "Hmm. Now you guys? Let's get started." (I declared war on the Tea Party.)
Mika: "I'll be praying for you guys. I won't let you go any further."
Mika: "Is this the end?" (Tea Party proposes peace talks)
Mika: "Easy win~. It wasn't a big deal."
Mika: "Ahaha! You can't be satisfied with the way things are now? Then why don't you live up to your expectations a little more?" (He refused to make peace with the Tea Party.)
Mika: "Easy win~. It wasn't a big deal."
Mika: "Ahaha. Impossible."
Mika: "Why is that...? I'm sorry, if only I could have done better..." (Tea Party lost)
Mika: "Why is that...? I'm sorry, if only I could have done better..." (Tea Party lost)

Fits the tea party agenda.

Fits the Tea Party agenda "religious intolerance" (same religion)

fit the Tea Party agenda "zealots" (following the religion founded by the Tea Party)
